biggie: Yeah, this album is dedicated To all the teachers that told me I'd never amount to nothin' To all the people that lived above the buildings that I was hustlin' in front of Called the police on me when I was just tryin' to make some money to feed my daughter (it's all good) And all the niggas in the struggle You know what I'm sayin'? aerosmith: Every time I look in the mirror All these lines on my face getting clearer The past is gone It went by like dusk to dawn Isn't that the way?
